document_data.name: Onthalasp
document_data.mainbody: '''Onthalasp''' was a temple to [[Umberlee]], the Sea Queen, clinging to the tiny '''Onthalaspan Isle''' in the northern part of [[Nelanther Isles]] in the [[Sea of Swords]] around the 11{{th}} to early 13{{th}} centuries [[DR]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: It was the home of High Trident [[Arthaeuil Nrensam]], who wrote ''[[Words on a Wave]]'' in the [[1016 DR|Year of the Roaring Tempest, 1016 DR]].
document_data.History: In the [[1226 DR|Year of the Black Buck, 1226 DR]], during a huge storm called Umberlee's Displeasure, both Onthalasp and its isle completely disappeared.
